sub_title: Senior advisor addiction prevention fund, Dutch Gambling Authority
summary: At present, I am working as advisor of the addiction prevention fund at the Dutch Gambling Authority. By nature, I am an inquisitive person. Over the course of my studies and various employment opportunities (City of Eindhoven, Dutch Embassy in Turkey, public affairs bureau in The Hague), I have grown to become a well-rounded analyst that can quickly pick out the key points from a given issue and who can rapidly inform himself of new subjects. I have organized multiple events, speak in public regularly, and am a natural team player. As a stress-resistant person who perseveres at all times, I am a good addition to any team that strives for optimal quality.
